name: Air Rider
description:
Welcome to the era of balloon flight, where travel was adventurous and risky. A world where balloon pilots gained notoriety from their glorious achievements.

You are a pilot in an attempt to break the distance record of a passenger flight.  Gain prestige by flying a hot air balloon as far as you can and landing alive. 

Passengers beware, your pilot is risking everything on this flight and may eject you overboard to survive. That is the risk you accept to be part of this momentous flight.
